about_the_game:
Contains:
  • 3 Months of Premium - Includes 100 tokens per month, free training matches, full access to the Assistant Manager, and more!
  • A deck of 20 cards with at least 1 legendary, 1 epic, and 1 rare
  • 3 cosmetic shields to spruce up your club (Premium Shield D10, Premium Shield B1, Premium Shield E2)

This dlc must be redeemed in game under Settings -> DLC
This pack can only be purchased once per account
detailed_description:
Contains:
  • 3 Months of Premium - Includes 100 tokens per month, free training matches, full access to the Assistant Manager, and more!
  • A deck of 20 cards with at least 1 legendary, 1 epic, and 1 rare
  • 3 cosmetic shields to spruce up your club (Premium Shield D10, Premium Shield B1, Premium Shield E2)

This dlc must be redeemed in game under Settings -> DLC
This pack can only be purchased once per account

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Multi core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10
  • Processor: Multi core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
